verses.verse: Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Cut <S%H6458><s%> out for yourself two <S%H8147><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> like the former <S%H7223><s%> ones, <S%H7223><s%> and I will write <S%H3789><s%> on the tablets <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that were on the former <S%H7223><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shattered. <S%H7665><s%>

"So be ready <S%H3559><s%> by morning, <S%H1242><s%> and come <S%H5927><s%> up in the morning <S%H1242><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and present <S%H5324><s%> yourself <S%H5324><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> to Me on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

"And no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is to come <S%H5927><s%> up with you, nor <S%H408><s%> let any <S%H1571><s%> man <S%H376><s%> be seen <S%H7200><s%> anywhere <S%H3605><s%> on the mountain; <S%H2022><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> and the herds <S%H1241><s%> may not graze <S%H7462><s%> in front <S%H4136><s%> of that mountain. <S%H2022><s%>"

So he cut <S%H6458><s%> out two <S%H8147><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> like the former <S%H7223><s%> ones, <S%H7223><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, and he took <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> in the cloud <S%H6051><s%> and stood <S%H3320><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> with him as he called <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> by in front <S%H6440><s%> of him and proclaimed, <S%H7121><s%> "The Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> compassionate <S%H7349><s%> and gracious, <S%H2587><s%> slow <S%H750><s%> to anger, <S%H639><s%> and abounding <S%H7227><s%> in lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth; <S%H571><s%>

who keeps <S%H5341><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> for thousands, <S%H505><s%> who forgives <S%H5375><s%> iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> transgression <S%H6588><s%> and sin; <S%H2403><s%> yet He will by no <S%H3808><s%> means <S%H5352><s%> leave <S%H5352><s%> [the guilty] unpunished, <S%H5352><s%> visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of fathers on the children <S%H1><s%> and on the grandchildren <S%H1121><s%> to the third <S%H1121><s%> and fourth <S%H8029><s%> generations. "
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> made <S%H4116><s%> haste <S%H4116><s%> to bow <S%H6915><s%> low <S%H6915><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and worship. <S%H7812><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "If <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in Thy sight, <S%H5869><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> I pray, <S%H4994><s%> let the Lord <S%H136><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> along in our midst, <S%H7130><s%> even <S%H3588><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> are so obstinate <S%H7186><s%>; <S%H6203><s%> and do Thou pardon <S%H5545><s%> our iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and our sin, <S%H9128><s%> and take <S%H5157><s%> us as Thine own possession. <S%H5157><s%>"

Then God said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant. <S%H1285><s%> Before <S%H5048><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> I will perform <S%H6213><s%> miracles <S%H6381><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have not been produced <S%H1254><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> among any <S%H3605><s%> of the nations; <S%H1471><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you live will see <S%H7200><s%> the working <S%H4639><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for it is a fearful <S%H3372><s%> thing <S%H3372><s%> that I am going to perform <S%H6213><s%> with you.

"Be sure to observe <S%H8104><s%> what <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you this day: <S%H3117><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to drive <S%H1644><s%> out the Amorite <S%H567><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%>

"Watch <S%H8104><s%> yourself that you make <S%H3772><s%> no <S%H6435><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> into which <S%H834><s%> you are going, <S%H935><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> it become <S%H1961><s%> a snare <S%H4170><s%> in your midst. <S%H7130><s%>

"But [rather,] you are to tear <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> their altars <S%H4196><s%> and smash <S%H7665><s%> their [sacred] pillars <S%H4676><s%> and cut <S%H3772><s%> down <S%H3772><s%> their Asherim <S%H842><s%>

– for you shall not worship <S%H7812><s%> any <S%H312><s%> other <S%H312><s%> god, <S%H410><s%> for the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> is Jealous, <S%H7067><s%> is a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H410><s%> –

lest <S%H6435><s%> you make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> and they play <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with their gods, <S%H430><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to their gods, <S%H430><s%> and someone invite <S%H7121><s%> you to eat <S%H398><s%> of his sacrifice; <S%H2077><s%>

and you take <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of his daughters <S%H1323><s%> for your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters <S%H1323><s%> play <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with their gods, <S%H430><s%> and cause your sons <S%H1121><s%> [also] to play <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with their gods. <S%H430><s%>
"You shall make <S%H6213><s%> for yourself no <S%H3808><s%> molten <S%H4541><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>

"You shall observe <S%H8104><s%> the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of Unleavened <S%H4682><s%> Bread. <S%H4682><s%> For seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you are to eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, <S%H4682><s%> as I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, at the appointed <S%H4150><s%> time <S%H4150><s%> in the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib, <S%H24><s%> for in the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib <S%H24><s%> you came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"The first <S%H6363><s%> offspring <S%H6363><s%> from every <S%H3605><s%> womb <S%H7358><s%> belongs to Me, and all <S%H3605><s%> your male <S%H2145><s%> livestock, <S%H4735><s%> the first <S%H6363><s%> offspring <S%H6363><s%> from cattle <S%H7794><s%> and sheep. <S%H7716><s%>

"And you shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> with a lamb <S%H7716><s%> the first <S%H6363><s%> offspring <S%H6363><s%> from a donkey; <S%H2543><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> you do not redeem <S%H6299><s%> [it,] then you shall break <S%H6202><s%> its neck. <S%H6202><s%> You shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the first-born of your sons. <S%H1121><s%> And none <S%H3808><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me empty-handed.

"You shall work <S%H5647><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall rest; <S%H7673><s%> [even] during plowing <S%H2758><s%> time <S%H2758><s%> and harvest <S%H7105><s%> you shall rest. <S%H7673><s%>

"And you shall celebrate <S%H6213><s%> the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of Weeks, <S%H7620><s%> [that is,] the first <S%H1061><s%> fruits <S%H1061><s%> of the wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest, <S%H7105><s%> and the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of Ingathering <S%H614><s%> at the turn <S%H8622><s%> of the year. <S%H8141><s%>

"Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> a year <S%H8141><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your males <S%H2138><s%> are to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H113><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"For I will drive <S%H3423><s%> out nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you and enlarge <S%H7337><s%> your borders, <S%H1366><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall covet <S%H2530><s%> your land <S%H776><s%> when you go <S%H5927><s%> up three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> a year <S%H8141><s%> to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

"You shall not offer <S%H7819><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of My sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> with leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread, <S%H2557><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> is the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of the Passover <S%H6453><s%> to be left <S%H3885><s%> over <S%H3885><s%> until morning. <S%H1242><s%>

"You shall bring <S%H935><s%> the very first <S%H7225><s%> of the first <S%H1061><s%> fruits <S%H1061><s%> of your soil <S%H127><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> You shall not boil <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in its mother's milk. <S%H2461><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Write <S%H3789><s%> down <S%H3789><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> for in accordance <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6310><s%> with these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> I have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you and with Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

So he was there <S%H8033><s%> with the Lord <S%H3068><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights; <S%H3915><s%> he did not eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> or drink <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%> And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> on the tablets <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> the Ten <S%H6235><s%> Commandments. <S%H1697><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when Moses <S%H4872><s%> was coming <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> (and the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> [were] in Moses <S%H4872><s%>' hand <S%H3027><s%> as he was coming <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain <S%H2022><s%>), that Moses did not know <S%H3045><s%> that the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his face <S%H6440><s%> shone <S%H7160><s%> because of his speaking <S%H1696><s%> with Him.

So when Aaron <S%H175><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his face <S%H6440><s%> shone, <S%H7160><s%> and they were afraid <S%H3372><s%> to come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> him.

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to them, and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the rulers <S%H5387><s%> in the congregation <S%H5712><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to him; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H5066><s%> near, <S%H5066><s%> and he commanded <S%H6680><s%> them [to do] everything <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to him on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>
When Moses <S%H4872><s%> had finished <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> with them, he put <S%H5414><s%> a veil <S%H4533><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> his face. <S%H6440><s%>

But whenever Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> with Him, he would take <S%H5493><s%> off <S%H5493><s%> the veil <S%H4533><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he came <S%H3318><s%> out; and whenever he came <S%H3318><s%> out and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> what <S%H834><s%> he had been commanded, <S%H6680><s%>

the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> would see <S%H7200><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> that the skin <S%H5785><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>' face <S%H6440><s%> shone. <S%H7160><s%> So Moses would replace <S%H7725><s%> the veil <S%H4533><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he went <S%H935><s%> in to speak <S%H1696><s%> with Him.
